property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the TextImportPreference &#40;a Application).

property.name: characterSet
property.shortdesc: The computer language character set used to create the text file.

property.name: platform
property.shortdesc: The platform used to create the imported text file.

property.name: dictionary
property.shortdesc: The dictionary to use for the imported text.

property.name: stripReturnsBetweenLines
property.shortdesc: If true, the import filter removes extra carriage returns at the ends of lines.

property.name: stripReturnsBetweenParagraphs
property.shortdesc: If true, the import filter removes extra carriage returns between paragraphs.

property.name: convertSpacesIntoTabs
property.shortdesc: If true, converts the specified number of spaces into a tab. For information on specifying the number of spaces, see spaces into tabs count.

property.name: spacesIntoTabsCount
property.shortdesc: The number of spaces to convert to a tab. Note: Valid when convert spaces into tabs is true.

property.name: useTypographersQuotes
property.shortdesc: If true, convert straight quotes and apostrophes in the imported text to typographic quotation marks and apostrophes.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TextImportPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
